snippet: The Mana Contemporary arts complex in Jersey City remains one of the metropolitan area’s biggest cultural secrets and its namesake remains low profile.
abstract: Mana Contemporary arts complex in Jersey City remains one of the metropolitan area's biggest cultural secrets; facility was created by Moishe Mana, low-profile storage and moving magnate, who conceived idea of displaying art that is otherwise kept by collectors in storage; complex, nearly a million square feet in size, has grown to include studios, galleries, a rehearsal space foundry, and more.
lead_paragraph: The Mana Contemporary arts complex in Jersey City remains one of the metropolitan area’s biggest cultural secrets and its namesake remains low profile.

headline.seo: Moving Magnate Is the Impresario Behind Mana Contemporary
headline.main: A Man, a Van, a Plan
headline.print_headline: A Man, a Van, a Plan
